J

JCRRepositoryConfiguration - Annotation Type in com.buralotech.oss.jcrunit
This annotation is used to specify the parameters used to configure the JCR repository.
JCRRepositoryExtension - Class in com.buralotech.oss.jcrunit
JUnit 5 (Jupiter) extension that will start an embedded JCR repository before the test method execution and stop the embedded JCR repository when the test method completes.
